import React from "react"; import "./Chart.css"; export function Chart() { const data = [ { date: "Apr 1, 2025", sales: 115, purchase: 28 }, { date: "Apr 1, 2025", sales: 80, purchase: 35 }, { date: "Apr 1, 2025", sales: 55, purchase: 23 }, ] const maxValue = 120 const gridLines = [0, 30, 60, 90, 120] return (

Stocks Graph

{/* Grid lines */}
{gridLines.map((value) => (
{value}
))}
{/* Bars */}
{data.map((item, index) => (
{item.date}
))}
{/* Legend */}
Sales
Purchase
) }
